participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Compassionate and creative, Emily enjoys helping others and has a strong appreciation for the arts.
participant_1.background: I love to show my friends the sunflowers I grow. I like to go out fishing. I take great care of my skin. I love comics. I graduated with a nursing degree.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Artistic and introspective, Alex finds solace in creativity and values quietness in life.
participant_2.background: I don't dye my hair. I am single and live with my dog, who is a great listener. My family came from Greece in the 1950s. Ferrari is my favorite car company. I want a home in a quiet area where I can focus on my art.

content.text: I recently graduated with a nursing degree. I love it!
Congratulations! What do you like the most about it?
I love the idea of helping people. It's so rewarding.
That's great! My family came from Greece in the 1950s.
Wow, that's so interesting! Where do you live now?
In a quiet area where I can focus on my art. I love to draw and paint.
That's great! I love to draw and paint too. It's so relaxing.
Me too! It's a great way to de-stress.
Do you have any favorite artists?
I love Frida Kahlo and Salvador Dali.
Oh, they're both so good! I love their work too.
What's your favorite thing to draw?
That's awesome! I love drawing landscapes.
That's great! We should trade some drawings sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love that.
Great! I'll send you my email address.
Okay, great! I'll send you mine too
